verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him in the heights! <S%H4791><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him, all <S%H3605><s%> His angels; <S%H4397><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him, all <S%H3605><s%> His hosts! <S%H6635><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him, sun <S%H8121><s%> and moon; <S%H3394><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him, all <S%H3605><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> of light! <S%H216><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him, highest <S%H8064><s%> heavens, <S%H8064><s%> And the waters <S%H4325><s%> that are above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the heavens! <S%H8064><s%>
Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> For He commanded <S%H6680><s%> and they were created. <S%H1254><s%>
He has also established <S%H5975><s%> them forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever; <S%H5769><s%> He has made <S%H5414><s%> a decree <S%H2706><s%> which will not pass <S%H5674><s%> away. <S%H5674><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> Sea <S%H8577><s%> monsters <S%H8577><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> deeps; <S%H8415><s%>
Fire <S%H784><s%> and hail, <S%H1259><s%> snow <S%H7950><s%> and clouds; <S%H7008><s%> Stormy <S%H9370><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> fulfilling <S%H6213><s%> His word; <S%H1697><s%>
Mountains <S%H2022><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> hills; <S%H1389><s%> Fruit <S%H6529><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> cedars; <S%H730><s%>
Beasts <S%H9130><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> cattle; <S%H929><s%> Creeping <S%H7431><s%> things <S%H7431><s%> and winged <S%H3671><s%> fowl; <S%H6833><s%>
Kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> peoples; <S%H3816><s%> Princes <S%H8269><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>
Both young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> and virgins; <S%H1330><s%> Old <S%H2205><s%> men <S%H2205><s%> and children. <S%H5288><s%>

Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> For His name <S%H8034><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> is exalted; <S%H7682><s%> His glory <S%H1935><s%> is above <S%H5921><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> and heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And He has lifted <S%H7311><s%> up a horn <S%H7161><s%> for His people, <S%H5971><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> His godly <S%H2623><s%> ones; <S%H2623><s%> [Even] for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> to Him. Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
